column4: "Ka kyerɛ Israelmba dɛ wɔnsan hɔn ekyir na wɔnkɛkyer nsera wɔ Pi-hahirot a wɔ Migidɔl nye Mbɛw po  no ntamu na ɔbɛn Baal-zefon no enyim: ne tsentsendo na hom nkyer nsera no wɔ po no ne nkyɛn."
column5: "#14.2 MBƐW PO: Dɛm po yi ara so na wɔfrɛ no Po kɔkɔɔ no."

column2: "Na Farao bɛse wɔ Israelmba ho dɛ
column3: Wɔatoto wɔ asaase no do
na obetsiw hom; na mebɛhyɛ m’enyim nyam wɔ Farao nye no dɔm nyinara do; na Egyptfo bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE. Na wɔyɛɛ dɛm."

column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Egypthen no dɛ ɔman no eguan kɔ: na Farao nye no nkowaa no hɔn akoma sakyeree wɔ ɔman no ho
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column5: dɛ yɛama Israel egyaa hɛn som kɔ yi?"

column3: na ɔfaa ne man kaa no ho:"

column2: "na ɔfaa ntseaseanam a wɔasan mu eyi ahaesia
column3: na Egypt ntseaseanam nyinara
column4: na hɔn nyinara hɔn do asafohemfo."

column3: na otsiiw Israelmba no: na Israelmba no dze ahosɛpɛw kɛse fiir edzi kɔree."
Farao no mpɔnkɔ nye ne ntseaseanam nyinara
column6: na wɔbɔtoo hɔn dɛ wɔakyer nsera wɔ po no ano

column3: Israel memaa hɔn enyi do
column6: Egyptfo etu dzi hɔn ekyir reba; na wosuroo dodow; na Israelmba no sui frɛɛ EWURADZE."

column3: Osiandɛ ndakamona nnyi Egypt ntsi
column4: na eyi hɛn hɔ ma yerubowuwu wɔ sar do yi? Ebɛnadze ntsi na enye hɛn edzi no dɛm yi
column5: dɛ iyii hɛn fii Egypt bae yi?"

column2: "Ana nnyɛ yi nye asɛm a yɛkaa kyerɛɛ wo wɔ Egypt no
column3: dɛ
column4: Gyaa hɛn ma yɛnsom Egyptfo no? Osiandɛ nkyɛ obeye ama hɛn dɛ yɛbɔsom Egyptfo mbom sen dɛ yebowuwu wɔ sar do."

column3: Mma hom nnsuro
column5: na hom nhwɛ EWURADZE no nkwagye a ɔrebɛyɛ akyerɛ hom ndɛ da yi: na Egyptfo a hom ehu hɔn ndɛ da yi

column3: na hom nka hom ano nto mu."
Ebɛnadze ntsi na isu frɛ me yi? Kasa kyerɛ Israelmba
na tsen wo nsa wɔ po no do
column4: na paa mu: na Israelmba nnantsew mfa po no ne finimfin wɔ daadze kɛsɛɛ do."

column3: hwɛ
column5: na wobedzi hom ekyir: na mebɛhyɛ m’enyim nyam wɔ Farao do

column2: "Na Egyptfo no bohu dɛ emi nye EWURADZE
column3: aber a mahyɛ m’enyim nyam wɔ Farao do

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn no bɔfoe a odzi Israel nseraban enyim no
column3: ɔtwee noho na okedzii hɔn ekyir; na mununkum dum no twee fii hɔn enyim

column2: "na ɔbaa Egypt nseraban no nye Israel nseraban no ntamu; na ɔyɛɛ mununkum nye sum
column3: naaso ɔmaa kan anadwe: na kor ammba kor nkyɛn anadwe ne nyinara."

column2: "Na Moses tseen ne nsa wɔ po no do; na EWURADZE dze boka mframa dzendzen maa po no kɔr ekyir anadwe no nyinara
column3: na ɔyɛɛ po no asaase kɛsɛɛ

column2: "Na Israelmba no nantsewee faa po no ne finimfin wɔ daadze kɛsɛɛ no do: na nsu no yɛɛ hɔn fadum wɔ hɔn nsa enyimfa
column3: nye hɔn abankum."
na wodzii hɔn ekyir kɔr po no ne finimfin

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ anapa dasu mu no
column3: EWURADZE nam ogya nye mununkum dum no mu hwɛɛ Egyptfo dɔm no
column4: na ɔkaa Egyptfo dɔm no gui."

column2: "Na ohuhuaan hɔn ntseaseanam n’anan hwiir ma no ntwee mu yɛɛ dzen: ma dɛm ntsi Egyptfo no see dɛ
column3: Hom mma yemfi Israel enyim nguan; osiandɛ EWURADZE roko tsia Egyptfo dze ma hɔn."
Tsen wo nsa wɔ po no do
column4: ma nsu no mbra bio wɔ Egyptfo do

column2: "Na Moses tseen ne nsa wɔ po no do
column3: na adze kyee anapa no po no saan n’ekyir peem dɛ mbrɛ ɔtse no ara
column4: na Egyptfo guanee behyiaa no; na EWURADZE toow Egyptfo guu po no ne finimfin."

column3: na ɔbɛkataa ntseaseanam
column5: mekyerɛ Farao no dɔm a wodzii hɔn ekyir kɔr po no ne finimfin no nyinara do; hɔn mu kor mpo annka."

column3: wɔnantseew asaase kɛsɛɛ do wɔ po no ne finimfin; na nsu no yɛɛ fadum maa hɔn wɔ hɔn nsa enyimfa

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE sii gyee Israel nkwa da no fii Egyptfo nsamu nye no: na Israel hun Egyptfo no dɛ woewuwu gu po no ano."
"Na Israel hun dwuma kɛse a EWURADZE dzii no wɔ Egyptfo do
column3: na ɔman no suroo EWURADZE: na wɔgyee EWURADZE
